title.en: Senpai ga Uzai Kouhai no Hanashi

altTitles.en: A Story About a Senior Who Annoys His Junior
A Story About a Senpai Who Annoys His Kouhai
My Senpai Is Annoying

altTitles.ja-ro: Senpai ga Urusai Kouhai no Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 先輩がうざい後輩の話

description.en:
Futaba Igarashi is a diminutive office lady who finds that her towering and boisterous work senpai Harumi Takeda always gets in her hair, but he always has her back, he always keeps her company, and she starts noticing that her heart is slowly veering towards him…  
  
1st place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga (2018)

---

description.ja:
ちょっぴりガサツだけど面倒見のいい先輩・武田と、そんな彼に素直になれない（？）後輩・五十嵐。

今日も五十嵐は武田をうざいと思いつつ、本当はまんざらでもなかったりやっぱり本当にうざいときもあったりと自覚のない二人の微妙な距離感にもだえちゃうことまちがいなし！
description.uk: Іґараші - працьовита молода офісна жінка. Такеда - семпай з роботи, нервує її постійно - і все ж вона стає все ближче до нього. Кожен день наповнений комічними невдачами та романтичними моментами, коли Іґараші намагається збалансувати роботу, життя та кохання.
description.pt-br: Igarashi é uma jovem esforçada que trabalha em um escritório. Takeda, o senpai acima dela no trabalho, a irrita constantemente - e ainda assim ela se encontra cada vez mais próxima dele. Todos os dias são repletos de contratempos cômicos e momentos românticos enquanto Igarashi tenta equilibrar trabalho, vida e amor.

title.en: Seijo no Maryoku wa Bannou desu: Mou Hitori no Seijo

altTitles.ja: 聖女の魔力は万能です ～もう一人の聖女～

altTitles.en: The Saint's Magic Power Is Omnipotent: The Other Saint
The Power of the Saint is All Around: The Other Saint

description.en: Aira Misono is a run-of-the-mill high school girl, and never imagined that she’d be summoned to another world, let alone declared its savior. Yet from the moment the handsome Prince Kyle lays eyes on her, he’s convinced that she’s the long-awaited Holy Saint destined to banish darkness from his world. Aira herself maintains significant doubts. Is she really up to this challenge? She might be able to use magic, but is she really a Saint? Aira’s fears and struggles only deepen when the woman summoned alongside her begins to look more and more like the one who truly deserves that title.

altTitles.en: The King of the Undead

description.en:
A group of people who are running away from the masses of infected corpses, aka zombies, are trying to fight back. Will they succeed? Or will they die and become zombies themselves?

**Links:**
- Alternatice Official Raw - [Kakao Webtoon](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/언데드킹/2300)
- Defunct Official English - [SpotToon](https://www.spottoon.com/book/21/UNDEAD_KING) | [Tapas](https://tapas.io/episode/457276) | [MangaToon](https://mangatoon.mobi/en/detail/16490)
- [Official Chinese translation](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/ComicInfo/id/525176)

title.en: Yuusha ni Zenbu Ubawareta Ore wa Yuusha no Hahaoya to Party wo Kumimashita!

altTitles.ja: 勇者に全部奪われた俺は勇者の母親とパーティを組みました！

altTitles.zh-hk: 被勇者奪取全部的我，和勇者的母親組成了隊伍！

altTitles.zh: 被勇者踢出队伍的我，最后和他们的妈妈组队了！

altTitles.id: Pahlawan Mengambil Segalanya Dariku, Jadi Aku Menikahi Ibunya!

altTitles.tr: Kahraman Her Şeyimi Elimden Çaldı, Ben de Annesiyle Parti Yaptım!

altTitles.en: The Hero Took Everything from Me, So I Partied with the Hero’s Mother!

description.en:
A young man wants to marry the mothers of the hero's party—

As a member of the hero's party Ceres, the main character, set out to defeat the demon king.
But one day, he was suddenly dismissed by the hero, and he had to leave the party.
All alone, Ceres sought to find a domestic slave to take care of him. What he saw at the slave market was Ms Shizuko, the mother of the hero, sold as a slave—??

The unreasonably expelled young man's Isekai mama harem is born!!
description.id:
Seorang pemuda ingin menikahi ibu dari kelompok pahlawan—

Sebagai anggota kelompok pahlawan Ceres sang tokoh utama, berangkat untuk mengalahkan raja iblis.
Namun suatu hari, dia tiba-tiba di keluarkan dari kelompok pahlawan oleh sang pahlawan,
Seorang diri, Ceres mencari budak rumah tangga untuk merawatnya. Namun apa yang dia lihat di pasar budak adalah Nyonya Shizuko, ibu dari sang pahlawan, dijual sebagai budak—??

Harem Isekai yang tak masuk akal dari pemuda yang dikeluarkan dari kelompok pahlawan lahir!!
description.ja:
少年が結婚したいのは、
勇者パーティのお母さんたちでした――

勇者パーティの一員として
魔王の倒す旅に出ている主人公・セレス。

だがある日突然、勇者ゼクトからクビ宣告を受け、
パーティを抜けることに。

一人になったセレスは、
身の回りの世話役として家事奴隷探しへ。

その奴隷市場で見かけたのは
奴隷として売られた、勇者の母親である静子さんの姿が――？？

理不尽に追放された少年の
異世界ママハーレムが産声を上げる！！
description.pt-br: Ceres e seus amigos de infância criaram um grupo de aventureiros nomeado de “luz da esperança”, mas depois que Zect, um de seus amigos, se tornou o grande herói, ele expulsou Ceres do grupo. Agora, só restava ao extasiado Ceres retornar para seu vilarejo. Contudo, quando foi comprar uma escrava para auxiliá-lo, Ceres se deparou com Shizuko, a mãe do grande herói Zect!

title.en: I Tried to Turn Down a Confession from a Beautiful Girl

altTitles.ja: 美女からの告白断ってみた
魔王さまエクスチェンジ!!

description.en: Hero Filina’s party is on the brink of annihilation in the face of a powerful Demon Lord. The almighty demon proposes to spare their lives on one condition - that he may swap bodies with the hero for a year. Atty, a Priest and Filina’s childhood friend, naturally objects to the proposal, but Filina agrees to the terms to protect her companions. Thus begins a new journey for the Demon Lord, naive to the ways of the world, and the quirky group of adventurers, as they set out to vanquish the new Demon Lord once and for all...!!

altTitles.en: Ginga Legend Weed
Silver Fang Legend Weed

altTitles.ja: 銀牙伝説WEED
銀牙伝説ウィード

description.en:
A dog named Weed happens to hear he is the son of Gin, the great leader of Ohu, who lead the dogs of Ohu to victory in a fight against the monstrous bear Akakabuto.   
Weed wants to find his father no matter what.   
On his way to find him, Weed hears that his father has been captured by a ruthless villain called Hougen.  
  
Sequel to Ginga Nagareboshi Gin.

altTitles.ja: ビー・バップ・ハイスクール

description.en:
The story revolves around the lives of two rough-and-tumble high school friends Kato Hiroshi and Nakama Toru, who seemed to make a habit of getting into trouble and starting up fights. In keeping with the spirit of the manga, Toru and Hiroshi sport slicked back 50's style ducktails and adopted exaggerated swaggers that made them comical and yet also oddly cool. The drama also features an assortment of outlandish characters who sport even weirder fashions and hairdos. To describe the action in this drama, think Fight Club meets The Breakfast Club.  
  
---
 - **Won the 12th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 1988, which it shared with Bonobono**

title.en: A Story of Being Toyed with by the Plain Girl in Class

altTitles.ja: クラスの地味女子に翻弄されるはなし

altTitles.ja-ro: Class no Jimi Joshi ni Honrou Sareru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 俺は大魔導士だ！

description.en:
Sunghoon Lee is nothing but a victim of a changing world, a powerless man in a land infested with beasts and magic. Monsters from another world invaded earth, and they brought with them a sickness that pushes Sunghoon’s mother into an endless sleep. To pay off her medical bills, he braved a dangerous job as bait used by powerful superhumans called Awakeners to hunt monsters. But when he found himself at death’s door, the image of his past life flashes through his mind. There, he found his truth: he is the reincarnation of the Sorcerer King!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%99%95%EC%9D%B4%EB%8B%A4/2337)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/22830)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000335)

- [Official Russian Translation](https://rumix.me/ia_korol_volshebnik)
description.fr:
La planète a été envahie par des monstres, que seuls les sorciers peuvent chasser. Notre héros, simple humain, n'a pas vraiment d'autre choix que de jouer le rôle d’appât dans les chasses s’il veut un salaire décent. Mais un jour, blessé par une de ces créatures et sur le point de mourir, il se rappelle sa vie antérieure… en tant que roi des sorciers, rien que ça ! Armé de ses souvenirs et de ses nouveaux pouvoirs, sa vie devrait vite devenir intéressante.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%99%95%EC%9D%B4%EB%8B%A4/2337)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/22830)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000335)

- [Official Russian Translation](https://rumix.me/ia_korol_volshebnik)
description.ja:
10年前、次元が拗れてモンスターが溢れ出た。 同時に生まれたモンスター覚醒者たちは→モンスターを捕まえて大活躍をする。 「吉澤覚」は月に4回、お母さんの病院代を工面するために 覚醒者のハンティングを手伝って、 後処理をする危険千万の「ポーター」として活動をする。 そんな中でモンスターに大きな怪我を負ってから前世の記憶が戻ってくる… ”ん？俺死んだのか？” ”俺は前世に大魔導士のクラトゥラスだったじゃん！！” 前世の記憶を持った「吉澤覚」のパワハラ魔法が始まる！

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%99%95%EC%9D%B4%EB%8B%A4/2337)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/22830)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000335)

- [Official Russian Translation](https://rumix.me/ia_korol_volshebnik)
description.ko:
10년 전, 차원이 비틀리며 몬스터가 쏟아져 나왔다.
동시에 생겨난 초능력 각성자들이 몬스터를 잡으며 대세가 되는데...

성훈은 한 달에 네 번, 어머니의 병원비를 마련하기 위해
각성자의 사냥을 돕고, 뒤처리하는 위험천만한 '짐꾼'으로 활동한다.

그러던 중 몬스터에게 큰 부상을 입고 전생을 기억하게 되는데...

"어라, 나 죽었나?"

"나 전생에 대마도사 크라투라스였잖아!!!"

전생의 기억을 가진 성훈의 갑질 마법이 시작된다!!

*********************
판타지 화제작 데카스펠 작가님의 <나는 마도왕이다> 본격 웹툰화!
세계를 휩쓰는 마도왕의 마법을 웹툰으로 만나 보세요!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%99%95%EC%9D%B4%EB%8B%A4/2337)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/22830)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000335)

- [Official Russian Translation](https://rumix.me/ia_korol_volshebnik)
description.ru:
10 лет назад орда монстров из разлома в пространстве и времени начала атаковать человечество. В то же время люди начали пробуждать силу и охотиться на монстров за славой и деньгами. Санхун, нуждающийся в деньгах из-за болезни своей матери, берёт опасную работу, помогая охотиться на этих монстров четыре раза в месяц в качестве приманки. Но однажды, оказавшись тяжело раненным, он вспомнит свою прошлую жизнь.  
«Я что, только что умер? Погоди-ка, я был королём-волшебником Кратра в прошлой жизни?!»

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%99%95%EC%9D%B4%EB%8B%A4/2337)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/22830)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000335)

- [Official Russian Translation](https://rumix.me/ia_korol_volshebnik)
description.pt-br:
10 anos atrás, a horda de monstros da fenda formada da distorção do tempo e espaço iniciaram um ataque contra a humanidade. Ao mesmo tempo que, as pessoas começaram a despertar poderes e iniciaram uma caçada aos monstros em busca de fama e dinheiro. Lee SungHoon, à procura de dinheiro devido à doença de sua mãe, arruma um trabalho altamente perigoso, ajudando na caçada desses monstros bancando a isca para os caçadores, fazendo isso quatro vezes no mês. Mas, um dia, ele é gravemente ferido por um monstro e relembra de sua vida passada como o Rei dos Feiticeiros. "Hã? Eu acabei de morrer? Espera aí, eu era O Rei dos Feiticeiros Kuratauras na minha vida passada?" Com as memórias de sua vida anterior, o espetáculo do poder mágico esmagador de SungHoon se inicia.   

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%99%95%EC%9D%B4%EB%8B%A4/2337)
---

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000335)

- [Official Russian Translation](https://rumix.me/ia_korol_volshebnik)

altTitles.ja: アネモネは熱を帯びる

description.en: Nagisa Ootsuki shed her former self out of shame from failing her highschool entrance exams. On her first day in her new highschool, who does she meet but the girl who made her fail the exam! How does Nagisa deal with these complicated emotions?
description.id: Nagisa Ootsuki melepaskan dirinya yang dulu karena malu karena gagal dalam ujian masuk sekolah menengahnya. Pada hari pertamanya di sekolah menengah barunya, siapa yang dia temui selain gadis yang membuatnya gagal dalam ujian! Bagaimana Nagisa menghadapi emosi yang rumit ini?
description.pt: Nagisa Ootsuki abandonou o seu antigo eu por vergonha de chumbar nos exames de admissão ao liceu. No seu primeiro dia na nova escola secundária, quem é que ela encontra senão a rapariga que a fez chumbar no exame! Como é que Nagisa lida com estas complicadas emoções?
description.pt-br: Nagisa Ootsuki abandonou o seu antigo eu por vergonha de reprovar no exame de admissão ao Ensino Médio. No seu primeiro dia na nova escola secundária, quem é que ela encontra senão a menina que a fez falhar na prova! Como Nagisa lidará com estas emoções complicadas?

title.en: Medusa-chan Realised She Has a Bad Case of Communication Disorder

altTitles.ja: 気づいたらめっちゃコミュ症になってたメデューサちゃん

altTitles.fr: Médusa a réalisé qu'elle avait des problèmes de communication

description.en: Stricken with an incurable disease that takes away her inherent power to turn people into stone with a look of her eyes, Sara was secretly delighted with the result of the disease while her parents weep. Little did she realise, she has a communication disorder.
description.fr: Après la perte de sa capacité, Sara va pouvoir regarder dans les gens dans les yeux.

title.en: The Return of Elena the Knight

altTitles.en: Return of the Female Knight
ROTFK
Lady in Armor

altTitles.vi: Sự Trở Lại của Nữ Hiệp Sĩ

description.en:
Elena, who spent her entire life as a cold-blooded female knight to avenge her family, ended up dying without claiming her revenge. When she opened her eyes she found that she went back into the past. By day she was a lady in a dress, and at night she carried a sword to change history and prevent her family's destruction.  
  
"I want to marry you, Your Highness," she said to the crown prince. She would do this to save her family.
description.id: Elena, yang menghabiskan seluruh hidupnya sebagai seorang ksatria wanita berdarah dingin untuk membalaskan dendam keluarganya, akhirnya mati tanpa menuntut balas. Ketika dia membuka matanya, dia menemukan bahwa dia kembali ke masa lalu. Pada siang hari dia menjadi seorang wanita bangsawan, dan pada malam hari dia membawa pedang untuk mengubah sejarah dan mencegah kehancuran keluarganya. "Saya ingin menikahi Anda, Yang Mulia," katanya kepada putra mahkota. Dia akan melakukan ini untuk menyelamatkan keluarganya.

title.en: Proficient in recovery spells and suddenly invincible

altTitles.zh: 精通回复法术突然无敌了

description.en: Doctor Ling Fan traveled through the world of immortal cultivation. Because his qualifications for cultivating immortals were extremely poor, he did not adopt the traditional cultivation and promotion process. Instead, he went in the opposite direction and studied the recovery spell in depth. After repeated experiments, he finally mastered the recovery spell.

altTitles.en: Love Emotion Theory

altTitles.ja: 恋愛感情論

description.en: Ryouma who works as a “boyfriend for rent” has a special constitution: He can see other people's emotions. One day, he meets a psychology student, Aoyama, who has a "black haze” around him. Curious about this unknown emotion, Ryouma tries to get closer to Aoyama. But when Aoyama finds out about his ability, Ryouma is asked to be part of a psychology experiment?! Still curious about the "black haze," Ryouma agrees to it for a while. What will happen in these 'experiments?' What is this "black haze?" Will Ryouma finally fall in love?

altTitles.ja: 高音さんと嵐ちゃん

altTitles.en: My First Girlfriend is a Gal
My First Gyaru

altTitles.ja: はじめてのギャル

altTitles.pt-br: Minha primeira namorada é uma Gal!

description.en: Spring. The 'season of love' has arrived and it seems that finding himself a girlfriend was harder than Jun'ichi believed. To break the status quo, Jun'ichi's friends have forced him into confessing to the gyaru, Yame Yukana. However, things do not go quite as he expected. A series of "firsts" begins!
description.pt-br: Junichi Hashiba é um jovem colegial virgem que está desesperado para perder esse status. Sob pressão de seus amigos, o garoto acaba se declarando para Yukana Yame. Surpreendentemente a garota aceita  e um casal é formado. Porém, Jun acaba se encontrando em águas desconhecidas com Yame, que é uma gyaru (um tipo de moda urbana japonesa). Enquanto ele fantasia em perder a sua virgindade, ela se mostra mais normal e inocente do que ele imaginava.

title.en: E, Shanai System Subete Wan'ope shiteiru Watashi wo Kaiko desu ka?

altTitles.ja: え、社内システム全てワンオペしている私を解雇ですか？

altTitles.ja-ro: E, Shanai System Subete OneOpe shiteiru Watashi o Kaiko Desu ka?

altTitles.en: Eh, Are You Seriously Going to Fire Me When I’ve Been Handling the Company’s In-House System as a One-Man Show?

description.en:
Satou Ai who has been handling the company's in-house system as a one-man show, has received a notice of dismissal upon a change in president. After the dismissal, Ai was alone in deep sorrows until she stumbled upon Suzuki Kenta. Kenta invites her to join his startup company. The company was something he started to get close to others with the name, "True programmer's cram school" with Ai's unconventional, daring and sometimes wild lectures, the student started to look forward to the lessons. 

To everyone working in a stressful company, this is a story that helps you smile a little for tomorrow's sake.

altTitles.ja: Made in Abyss Koushiki Anthology Dai Ni Sou: Kiken na Ooana
Made in Abyss Koushiki Anthology: Doshi Gataki Tankutsuka-tachi
メイドインアビス公式アンソロジー　度し難き探窟家たち
メイドインアビス公式アンソロジー第二層　キケンな大穴

description.en:
Made in Abyss: Official Anthology is a compendium of short comics set in the same world and with the same characters from Made in Abyss.  
It's a parallel series from the same publisher, Takeshobo, and with Akihito Tsukushi's blessing, that gathers the work of multiple guest professional artists to tell non-canon stories, with some of them being serious, while others are totally silly or humorous.   
It has been published on Webcomic Gamma, alongside with Made in Abyss, since 2017.

altTitles.en: Magical Girl Raising Project: Restart

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女育成計画restart

description.en: 16 Magical Girls have been chosen to participate in the Magical Girl Raising Project by an unknown person and this time, there's prize money involved. Every three days, their Magical Phones will pull them into an RPG-like simulation where they have to clear the game to get out!

title.en: Tomodachi Nano ni Kiss o Shita

altTitles.ja: 友達なのにキスをした

altTitles.en: We Kissed Even Though We Are Just Friends

description.en: Aoi and Keita, who attend the same high school, live next door to each other and have been childhood friends ever since Keita moved in when they were in middle school. Even though they're just friends who always goof around together, Aoi suddenly notices that Keita has been looking cool lately...

title.en: The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

altTitles.zh: 反派大师兄，师妹们全是病娇

altTitles.zh-ro: Fǎnpài Dà Shīxiōng, Shīmèimen Quán Shì Bìng Jiāo
Fanpai Da Shixiong, Shimeimen Quan Shi Bing Jiao

altTitles.en: The Big Villain Brother and the Junior Sisters Are All Sick and Delicate
The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

altTitles.es-la: El Gran Villano Hermano Mayor y todas sus Hermanas Menores Yandere

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

altTitles.ja: 甘辛義姉妹に挟まれてます

altTitles.en: I'm Sandwiched Between Sweet and Spicy Step-Sisters

description.en: One day, our plain protagonist suddenly got 2 sisters: a big-breasted gentle older sister type, and a devilish cute little sister!?  A slightly exciting family romantic comedy!
description.id:
dialah Takashi, si bajingan beruntung yang mendapatkan 2 saudari cantik setelah ayahnya menikah lagi, si adik, Kaho, gadis manis yang masih kelas 5 SD ini sangat suka mengelus peler abang tirinya dengan kaki, sedangkan sang kakak, Suzuha, mahasiswi tahun pertama alias D1, sangatlah ceroboh, sehingga menimbulkan kecelakaan yang sering berakibat erotis pada Takashi, Takashi sendiri ternyata adalah seorang wibu, kecintaannya pada waifu 2D sangat mempengaruhi ketidak-tertarikannya pada wanita di dunia nyata, terakhir kali dia bicara dengan perempuanpun dilakukannya saat masih kelas 5 SD, namun dengan bertambahnya keluarga baru ini, akankah Takashi berubah? mampukah dia berpaling dari waifu 2D-nya dan memilih salah 1 dari saudara tirinya? atau, akankah dia memilih keduanya? jawaban yang tentu sangat kita nanti ya pemirsa, ya sudah tidak perlu banyak cing-cong lagi, silahkan baca chapter yang tersedia.  
  


---

Pixiv: <https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/4677314>  
Fanbox (**18+ NSFW**): <https://kirisaki.fanbox.cc/>

altTitles.en: History's Number 1 Founder

description.en:
Lin Feng travelled through worlds and even obtained an overpowered system, but he still faces a pressure as huge as a mountain.

System’s main quest:
Lin Feng is to create a school; establish history’s number 1 sect and Lin Feng himself to become the number 1 founder.

To become history’s number 1 founder, Lin Feng started to work hard.

“Your name is Shi Tianhao? Natural born sovereign roots but it was stolen by your cousin? Now being raised in a little village your father placed you in? Come come come, follow your master and we’ll let those people know that justice that is owed must be returned!”

“Your name is Xiao Yan? A genius of the past but a loser now? Even your fiancé came over to humiliate you by asking for a divorce? Come come come, follow your master and we’ll let that brat know the meaning of: don’t bully a youngster just because he’s poor!”

“Your name is Zhu Yi? The son of a marquis but you’re being suppressed by your father? Your mother was a saint but she was assassinated? Come come come, follow your master and we’ll let your dad know the meaning how problems can be solved with your fists…no, with reasoning!”
description.zh: 简介穿越了，也有了一个系统，但林锋压力山大。系统主线任务：林锋开山立派，建立史上第一大宗门，林锋本人成为第一祖师。于是为了成为史上第一祖师爷，林锋开始奋斗。少年，跟为师一起开山立派吧！
description.pt-br: Lin Feng um viajante conseguiu um sistema que pode facilitar sua vida, mas ainda é muito difícil. Primeira missão do sistema, criar uma seita e conseguir discípulos e esta seita deve ser a melhor do mundo. Para ser o melho Lin Feng vai ter que trabalhar duro e ao mesmo tempo treinar seus novos discípulos.

altTitles.en: I Am Cool
I'm the Best

description.en: The story of junior high school student new outlook on life. Its an inspiring tale of the many issues in our modern society. And the undue pressures of society to conform their standards instead of being yourself. For those who dealt with issues such as bullying, weight, and appearance. This series is a must read.

title.en: Netorare Manga no Kuzu Otoko ni Tensei Shita Hazu ga Heroine ga Yottekuru Ken

altTitles.ja: 寝取られ漫画のクズ男に転生したはずがヒロインが寄ってくる件

altTitles.en: I Was Reincarnated As The Scumbag From a Netorare Manga, But The Heroine is Coming On To Me
The Story of a Man Who Is Reincarnated as the Shittiest Guy in a Doujin, but the Heroine Keeps on Coming Close to Him

altTitles.ja: 漫画に登場する最悪の男に生まれ変わったはずがヒロインが寄ってくる件

altTitles.zh: 我转生成了NTR漫画里的黄毛，但是女主却倾心于我

altTitles.ru: Я перевоплотился в подонка из netorare манги, но героиня предпочла меня главному герою

altTitles.ja-ro: Netorare Manga no Kuzu Otoko ni Tensei Shita Hazu ga Heroine ga Yottekuru Ken

description.en: I suddenly remembered. This world is the world of an erotic manga, and that I was reincarnated as the scumbag who is supposed to steal the heroine in this world. Well, I don't have such a hobby, so I thought the heroine should get along with the protagonist. But why are you paying attention to me, heroine?
description.ja:
ふと俺は思い出した。この世界がエロ漫画の世界であり、ヒロインを寝取る役目のクズ男に自分が転生したことを。まあ俺にその趣味はないので、ヒロインは主人公と仲良くやってくれ。と思ったのに…ヒロイン、なんでお前は俺に構うんだよ!
小説投稿サイト掲載の人気作『漫画に登場する最悪の男に生まれ変わったはずがヒロインが寄ってくる件』をついにコミカライズ!
description.pt-br: De repente, eu me lembrei. Este mundo é o mundo de um mangá erótico, e eu reencarnei como o canalha que supostamente vai roubar a heroína neste mundo. Bem, eu não tenho esse tipo de hobby, então eu achei que a heroína deveria se dar bem com o protagonista. Mas por que você está prestando atenção em mim, heroína?

title.en: Watashi wo Koroshita Wankokei Kishi-sama ga, Yandere ni Job Change shite Kyou mo Inochi wo Nerattekuru

altTitles.ja: 私を殺したワンコ系騎士様が、ヤンデレにジョブチェンジして今日も命を狙ってくる

altTitles.en: The Loyal Knight Killed Me. After Changing to a Yandere, He Is Still Fixated on Me

description.en:
Tiana's engagement was broken off by the prince of her own country, and she was sentenced to exile. However, the knight of a neighbouring country, who was an aide to that country's prince, suddenly proposed to her. Since he was her type, Tiana accepted the marriage proposal and traveled with him to his country, but what awaited her was an unjust death. However, although she should have died, Tiana finds herself back when her engagement was broken and she was proposed to by the knight!

"Now... Now it's too late... I'll have to kill her."

The last words the knight spoke before killing her lingered in her mind. But Tiana doesn't want to die again! Terrified, she tries to refuse the marriage proposal, but she can't escape from the knight who has gone completely crazy! A cat-and-mouse rom-com about Tiana, whose memories construe murderous intent, and a knight who refuses to let her escape and gets more and more yandere...

---
[Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n7132gu/) (R18)

title.en: A Gangster Became a High Schooler

description.en:
"My dream is to enter college."

Kim Deuk-pal, an uneducated man whose lifelong wish was to attend school, dies in a car accident while trying to save Song Yi-heon, a boy who jumped off an overpass while driving, on a rainy day.

'I hope that little thing lives.'

When Kim Deuk-pal wakes up and finds out that the real Song Yi-heon tried to kill him due to school bullying and outing, he decides to take revenge and goes to the high school of his dreams. However, Choi Se-kyung, Song Yi-heon's unrequited love, begins to suspect Song Yi-heon

"You're not Song Yi-heon."

title.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 9 - The JOJOLands

altTitles.ja-ro: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken Part 9 -  The JoJoLands

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 Part9 The JOJOLands

altTitles.es-la: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Parte 9 - Las JOJOLandias

altTitles.pl: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Część 9 - The JoJoLands

altTitles.fr: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Partie 9 - The JOJOLands

altTitles.pt-br: A Estranha Aventura de JoJo, Parte 9: As JoJoLândias

altTitles.it: Le Bizzarre Avventure di JoJo: Le JOJOLands

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第9部 ザ・ジョジョランズ

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?

altTitles.en: The Law Of Being Friends With A Male
Boyfriend's Rule

altTitles.ja: 男友達って彼氏になれる?

altTitles.en: Boy-Friend's Rule

description.en: Jay is a guy that wanted to talk with his friend about their secret crushes, When Jay was about to confess who he has a crush on, his friend Jiwoon, who’s crush is actually towards Jay, was hopefull that Jay was going to confess his feelings towards her. But she felt shocked when she learned that actually Jay’s crush was someone else, after that, Jay asked her about her crush, Jiwoon tried to avoid the question and gave him a vague description which caused a misunderstanding that his crush was actually towards Jay’s friend Seohyun. She and Jay are just good friends without anything romantic going on between them, The way Jay interacts with her is just in a friendly manner and tries to help her to get her “crush”….Let the romantic drama begin at school!
description.fr: La première romance de Jiun s'est terminée lorsque son béguin, Jae-i, lui avoue qu'il aime quelqu'un d'autre. Pour aggraver les choses, Jae-i croit à tort que le béguin de Jiun est son effrayant meilleur ami, Seohyeon, et il tente de l'aider à gagner le cœur de celui-ci. Maintenant, Jiun doit faire face à un plus gros problème qu'un amour à sens unique, le petit-copain qu'elle n'a jamais imaginé se rapprocher.
description.ko:
남몰래 '재이'를 짝사랑해온 '지운'.  재이가 자신에게 고백할 줄 알았던 지운은, 재이의 짝사랑 상대가 다른 사람이라는 사실을 알고는 정신이 아득해진다. 
짝사랑이 허무하게 끝났다고 생각함과 동시에, 재이가 자신의 짝사랑 상대를 '서현'이라고 착각하고 있다는 걸 알게 된다. 
그저 재이의 키 크고 덩치 큰 친구 중 하나일 뿐인, 말 그대로 남자인 사람 친구일 뿐인 서현과 자신을 이어주려는 재이의 행동에 해탈하고 마는데...

title.en: Shouwaru Tensai Osananajimi to no Shoubu ni Makete Hatsutaiken o Zenbu Ubawareru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 性悪天才幼馴染との勝負に負けて初体験を全部奪われる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Shouwaru Tensai Osananajimi to no Shoubu ni Makete Hatsutaiken wo Zenbu Ubawareru Hanashi

altTitles.th: เรื่องราวของการพ่ายแพ้การแข่งขันให้กับเพื่อนสมัยเด็กอัจฉริยะตัวร้ายผู้คอยพรากประสบการณ์ครั้งแรกทุกอย่างไป

altTitles.zh: 败给了性格恶劣的天才青梅，初体验全部被夺走这件事

altTitles.zh-hk: 敗給了性格惡劣的天才青梅，初體驗全部被奪走這件事

altTitles.en: How I Lose Bets With My Sadistic Gifted Childhood Friend and She Steals All of My Firsts

description.en:
A twisted girls' love story featuring: A devilish girl hiding behind the mask of an honor student x An ordinary girl who hates losing.

Wakaba Yoshizawa has a childhood friend named Komaki Umezono.

This girl wore the mask of an honor student with good morals who's blessed with both beauty and brains, but in reality she's an evil genius who looked down on people. For the sake of regaining the dignity she lost to Komaki, Wakaba challenges her to a match, but Komaki tells her "Each time I win, I will take one precious thing from you." as a condition!? Every time she loses to the girl she "hates", her true feelings get exposed.

(Source: Young Ace Up)
description.th: อุเมะโซโนะ โคมากิ เพื่อนสมัยเด็กของ โยชิซาวะ วาคาบะ เธอสวมหน้ากากนักเรียนดีเด่นทั้งที่เป็นผู้หญิงชั่วร้าย ที่ชอบดูถูกผู้คน เพื่อกอบกู้ศักดิ์ศรีที่โคมากิแย่งชิงไปจากเธอ วาคาบะ จึงต้องแข่งขันกับเธอ โดยมีเงื่อนไขว่าถ้าชนะ เธอจะพรากสิ่งสำคัญหนึ่งอย่างของวาคาบะไป...!? "ฉันเกลียดเธอ!" ถึงจะเป็นแบบนั้น ทุกครั้งที่พ่ายแพ้ความรู้สึกที่แท้จริงก็ค่อย ๆ ถูกเปิดเผยออกมา
description.es-la:
¡Una distorsionada historia de amor entre la estudiante modelo con una máscara demoníaca y la chica común que no se rinde!

Wakaba Yoshizawa, la amiga de la infancia de Wakaba, Komaizumi Komaki. Ella era una chica malvada que llevaba una máscara de estudiante modelo perfecta y talentosa, que miraba por encima del hombro a los demás. Wakaba desafía a Komaki para recuperar su dignidad que le fue arrebatada, pero se le pone una condición: "Si gano, tomaré una cosa importante de Wakaba una por una" ¡Cada vez que pierde contra ella, revela sus verdaderos sentimientos! ¡Una emocionante historia de amor entre chicas que ganó el Premio de Oro en el 28vo Concurso Sneaker Award, ahora en formato de cómic!
description.pt-br:
Uma história de amor distorcida entre garotas: uma garota diabólica escondida por trás da máscara de uma estudante exemplar x uma garota comum que odeia perder.

Wakaba Yoshizawa tem uma amiga de infância chamada Komaki Umezono.

Essa garota usava a máscara de uma estudante exemplar com boas virtudes, abençoada com beleza e inteligência, mas na realidade ela é uma gênio do mal que despreza as pessoas. Para recuperar a dignidade perdida para Komaki, Wakaba desafia-a para um duelo, mas Komaki lhe diz: "Cada vez que eu ganhar, vou tirar algo precioso de você." como condição!? Cada vez que ela perde para a garota que "odeia", seus verdadeiros sentimentos são expostos.

altTitles.en: The Genius Witch Lost MP.

altTitles.ja: 天才魔女の魔力枯れ

altTitles.pt-br: A Bruxa gênia perdeu seu MP

altTitles.vi: Nàng Phù Thủy Thiên Tài Hết Mana Rồi!

description.en: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
description.pt-br: Nayu, aquela em um milhão de bruxas geniais que tem sido o assunto da cidade, ficou sem magia! O preço por todas as coisas que ela foi autorizada a fazer por causa de seu brilhantismo está voltando para a ex-bruxa genial como um bumerangue... Então, ela lembrou de seu ex-aluno "Komugi", que a ama muito. Esta é uma comédia de amor de retribuição cármica por uma ex-bruxa genial que não pode ser deixada sozinha, mesmo que doa um pouco, abandonada por seus poderes mágicos!

altTitles.ja: お忍び同棲

altTitles.en: Living With a Kunoichi

description.en: Tae, a beautiful 17-year-old girl, and Kotaro, a serious office worker. These two seemingly happy people have a secret they can't reveal to anyone - the rival ninjas of Iga and Kouga secretly live together in this laid-back romantic comedy!
description.ja: 17歳の美少女・たえと、まじめな会社員の小太郎。一見幸せそうに見える二人には誰にも言えない秘密があった――伊賀・甲賀のライバル忍者がこっそり同棲生活を送る、まったりラブコメ！
description.pt-br: Tae, uma linda garota de 17 anos, e Kotaro, um sério trabalhador de escritório. Essas duas pessoas aparentemente felizes têm um segredo que não podem revelar a ninguém - os ninjas rivais de Iga e Kouga vivem secretamente juntos nesta comédia romântica descontraída!

title.en: Hazure Zokusei Tsuchi Mahou no Sei de Henkyou ni Tsuihousareta no de, Gangan Ryouchi Kaitakushimasu!

altTitles.en: Faulty Attribute Earth Magic

altTitles.ja-ro: Hazure Zokuseido Mahou No Sei De Henkyou Ni Tsuihou Sareta No De, Gangan Ryouchi Kaitaku Shimasu
Hazure Zokuseido Mahō No Sei De Henkyō Ni Tsuihō Saretanode, Gangan Ryōchi Kaitaku Shimasu ！

altTitles.ja: ハズレ属性土魔法のせいで辺境に追放されたので、ガンガン領地開拓します！

altTitles.ja-ro: Hazure Zokusei Tsuchi Mahou no Sei de Henkyou ni Tsuihousareta no de, Gangan Ryouchi Kaitakushimasu!

altTitles.en: I Was Banished to a Desolate Region Because of the Faulty Attribute Earth Magic, so I’m Going to Put in my All to Develop my Territory!

description.en:
Ecto, the third son of the Count Glenreed family, received the skill "Earth Magic" during his coming-of-age ceremony. Earth magic, which is not suitable for combat, is also called the "failure attribute". He was disowned and appointed as the lord of the ultra-remote Boda Village. However, thanks to "a certain secret", Ecto devised a way to use earth magic that ordinary people would not have thought of! Together with his bodyguard female adventurer party "Advancing Wings" and his companions, they defeat magical beasts, clear up forests, cultivate fields... 

Thanks to earth magic, Boda Village undergoes remarkable development!?
description.id:
Ecto, putra ketiga dari keluarga Count Glenreed, menerima keterampilan "Sihir Bumi" selama upacara kedewasaannya. Sihir bumi, yang tidak cocok untuk pertempuran, juga disebut "atribut kegagalan". Dia tidak diakui dan diangkat sebagai penguasa Desa Boda yang sangat terpencil. Namun, berkat "rahasia tertentu", Ecto menemukan cara untuk menggunakan sihir bumi yang tidak akan terpikirkan oleh orang biasa! Bersama dengan rombongan petualang wanita pengawalnya "Advancing Wings" dan teman-temannya, mereka mengalahkan binatang ajaib, membersihkan hutan, mengolah ladang ...
Berkat sihir bumi, Desa Boda mengalami perkembangan yang luar biasa!?
description.ja: グレンリード辺境伯家の三男・エクトは、成人の儀式の際、土魔法のスキルを授かる。戦闘向きでない土魔法はいわゆる「ハズレ属性」。勘当されたうえ、超僻地のボーダ村の領主に任命されてしまう。しかしエクトは「ある秘密」のおかげで普通の人には思いつかないような土魔法の活用法を考案していた！　護衛の女冒険者パーティ「進撃の翼」を始めとした仲間とともに、魔獣を倒し、森を切り拓き、畑を耕し……土魔法のおかげで、ボーダ村はめざましい発展を遂げていく!?

altTitles.ja: 戦奏教室

altTitles.en: The Bugle Call

description.en: The year is 1294, and war rages. Lucas, the bugler of a small mercenary band, is endlessly thrown into battle after battle, but longs for the day that he can fulfill his wish of becoming a real musician. One fateful day, however, Lucas's latent powers awaken and his life takes a drastic turn. Under the guidance of the Pope, Lucas is tasked to become a key player in the war and lead the fight against the Empire and its agent of destruction, the Garland. Burdened by this dangerous mission, Lucas still longs for the day that he may see his wish come true...

altTitles.ja: アデカン

description.en: Laid-back and somewhat absent-mindedly seductive umbrella craftsman Shiro, and hot-blooded officer Kojiro, who stands against all things undisciplined, become involved in a bloody and erotic thrill-ride in an off-kilter town. This action-packed jack-of-all-trades manga will have you swooning at its sexiness and leave you more addicted than opium!

title.en: Zhege Fanpai Youdian Liangxin, Danshi Bu Duo!

altTitles.en: Villain: My Brother Is The Chosen One
This Villain Has a Little Conscience, but Not Much!
This Villain Has Some Conscience, but Not Much!

altTitles.zh-ro: Zhège Fǎnpài Yǒudiǎn Liángxīn, Dànshì Bù Duō!

altTitles.zh: 反派：我的弟弟是天选之子
这个反派有点良心，但是不多！

description.en:
Qing Feng accidentally transmigrated to ancient times and became an overlord, the master of the Qing family. He thought that he could finally live a life where he’d have everything just by lying down. Who would know that his twin brother is the “legendary chosen one” and he’s the “destined villain”? To survive, he can only work hard with the help of the system!

[Ding Dong detected that the host smacked the chosen one’s ass. 100 villain points acquired]

[Ding dong, congratulations, host, on triggering the mission, tease the bathing Bi Yu. reward 200 villain points.]

Hehehe

Sometimes being a villain doesn’t seem like a bad idea.
description.pt-br:
Qing Feng acidentalmente transmigrou para os tempos antigos e se tornou um senhor supremo, o mestre da família Qing. Ele pensou que finalmente poderia viver uma vida em que teria tudo apenas deitado. Quem saberia que seu irmão gêmeo é o "escolhido lendário" e ele é o "vilão destinado"? Para sobreviver, ele só pode trabalhar duro com a ajuda do sistema!

[Ding Dong detectou que o anfitrião deu um tapa na bunda do escolhido. 100 pontos de vilão adquiridos.]

[Ding Dong, parabéns, anfitrião, por iniciar a missão, provocar Bi Yu no banho. 200 pontos de vilão adquiridos.]

Hahaha

As vezes ser um vilão não é tão ruim assim.

altTitles.ja: サタノファニ

description.en: A mysterious syndrome turns schoolgirls into homicidal monsters behind numerous atrocities in Japan. However, nothing is what it seems and when Chika Amagi is arrested for the brutal murder of five people, a journey into uncharted, troubled waters begins!
description.es: Un misterioso síndrome convierte a las colegialas en monstruos homicidas detrás de numerosas atrocidades en Japón. Sin embargo, nada es lo que parece y cuando Chika Amagi es arrestado por el brutal asesinato de cinco personas, ¡comienza un viaje a aguas desconocidas y turbulentas!
description.fr:
Au Japon, un mystérieux syndrome transforme les écolières d'un établissement en monstres sanguinaires, capables de tuer leurs semblables avec un sang-froid incroyable. Dans cette période de trouble, Chika Amagi, étudiante sans histoire, est arrêtée pour le meurtre terrible de cinq personnes…   


---
description.pt-br: Uma síndrome misteriosa torna jovens garotas em monstros homicidas por trás de diversas atrocidades no Japão. Entretanto, nada é o que parece quando Chika Amagai é presa pelo assassinato brutal de cinco pessoas e é levada a uma prisão em uma ilha para estas assassinas!

altTitles.en: Saiyuuki Gaiden
最遊記外伝

description.en: 500 years before the story of Saiyuki, a heretic child with golden eyes is brought into Heaven. He is given into the reluctant care of a minor deity named Konzen, the nephew of the Merciful Goddess Kanzeon Bosatsu. Konzen eventually gives the child the name "Goku". Goku becomes friends with two other minor gods, Marshal Tenpou and General Kenren of the Western Army of Heaven. He also meets a strange little boy who seems to be his own age, the War Prince Nataku. Although Goku is happy in his new home, Heaven is not kind to heretics. There are those who would use Nataku and Goku as tools in an attempt to seize the throne of Heaven, and Konzen, Tenpou, and Kenren may not be able to save them.

title.en: Tsuihousareru Tabi ni Skill wo Te ni Ireta Ore ga, 100 no Isekai de 2-shuume Musou

altTitles.ja: 追放されるたびにスキルを手に入れた俺が、100の異世界で2周目無双

altTitles.en: I Got a New Skill Every Time I Was Exiled, and After 100 Different Worlds, I Was Unmatched
Unmatched in 100 Different Worlds — I Gain a New Skill Every Time I Get Banished

altTitles.es: Cada vez que me Expulsaban, Adquiría una Nueva Habilidad y Después de 100 Mundos Diferentes, Ya no Tengo Rival

description.en:
An adventurer named Ed was exiled from his party because he was considered useless, but instead of being sad and upset he was actually happy!!?

It turns out that it's not without reason that he feels happy when he's exiled from his party, because every time he's been exiled he will receive a skill that makes him even more invincible...
- - -
Ed was given the crazy test of having to get expelled from 100 Hero parties in 100 different worlds before he could return to his original world. Finally a mysterious and divine entity said that he had achieved all the conditions to return to his original world.

However, as a final condition he is asked “Look at the fate of one of these exile worlds after you left.” and he is shocked by what he sees.

“Okay, I’ll do it! I’ll go down to these 100 worlds again and be banished with a good feeling!” Ed takes on a new challenge to make full use of the super-powerful “Exiled Skills” that were granted each time he was exiled, and this time ensure they all have happy endings.

Only this time he is accompanied to these 100 worlds by a former companion…
description.es: Ed, a quien se le dio la loca prueba de tener que ser expulsado de la party de 100 héroes en 100 mundos diferentes para poder regresar a su mundo original, finalmente cumpliendo las condiciones puede volver. Sin embargo Ed se entera de que el otro mundo al que quiere regresar ha tenido un final desastroso. Ahora para salvar a una chica elfa quien una vez fue su amiga, tendrá que volver a desafiar una nueva batalla para aprovechar al máximo la "habilidad de expulsión" para cambiar todos los finales de una forma convincente. ¡Comienza una historia para salvar 100 mundos diferentes!
description.id:
Seorang petualang bernama ed di keluarkan dari party nya karena di anggap tidak berguna, namun daripada sedih dan kesal dia malah bahagia!!?.

Ternyata bukan tanpa alasan dia merasa baagia ketika di keluarkan dari party nya di karenakan setiap kali dia di keluarkan dia akan menerima sebuah skill yang membuatnya jadi semakin tidak terkalahkan...

altTitles.ja: 終末トレインどこへいく？

altTitles.en: Train to the End of World
Tarantula

description.en:
A woman's bloody revenge against the corrupt nation's highest power begins.
Lim Nayoung, a housewife enjoying the sweet life of a newlywed.
Then one day, her husband returns as a cold corpse, and Nayoung, who feels that her husband, a homicide detective, was murdered, decides to avenge her husband...
in fact, she was seen as an ordinary housewife, was a top killer called "Tarantula," a North Korean secret agent dedicated to terrorist operations such as assassination and kidnapping before defecting from North Korea.

altTitles.ja: けがわとなかみ

altTitles.en: Under the Skin

description.en: One day, a rabbit confesses their love to a fox who tries to eat them. Despite the fox's confusion, the rabbit continues to tell her that they love her. Can the eater and the devoured live together?!

title.en: Hanabusa-kun wa Okuchi ga Ojouzu - Namete Suwarete, Susumerarete...

altTitles.ja: 英くんはおくちがお上手～なめて吸われて、すすられて…

altTitles.ja-ro: Hanabusa-kun wa Okuchi ga Ojouzu - Namete Suwarete, Susumerarete...

altTitles.en: I'm in Love With Mr. Hanabusa's Mouth
Hanabusa-kun Is Good with His Mouth - Licking, Sucking, and Slurping...

altTitles.zh-hk: 年下男友英君的嘴巴超厲害~又能吸、又能舔

altTitles.zh: 年下男友英君的嘴巴超厉害~又能吸、又能舔

description.en:
"Is this your first time? Would you like to borrow my mouth?" Coworkers Yuzuki and Himari are in for an exciting night when he offers to suck, lick, and slurp with this talented mouth. Will he make her cum for the first time? 

(Source: Coolmic)
description.ja: 自分本位な元カレのせいで、「おくち」で気持ちよくされたことのないOL・陽茉梨。やっと別れたのに、飲み会帰りに未練タラタラの元カレと鉢合わせ!?同僚の英くんが助けてくれたけど、「今カレのフリ」でキスされちゃった…！そのまま「俺と付き合います？」とホテルで迫られて――…おくちで愛されるのって、こんなに気持ちいいの…!?そして描き下ろしでは、英くんのおくちではなく×××が活躍っ!?　※この作品は過去、電子書籍「英くんはおくちがお上手～なめて吸われて、すすられて…１～６巻」に掲載されました。重複購入にご注意下さい。
description.zh-hk: 陽茉梨是一位OL，在和交往10年的前男友分手後，在公司酒席結束後遇到了糾纏不清的前男友，被年下同事英君給解圍。但對方卻吻了她，甚至當他假男友，就這樣到飯店被逼著說「要和我交往嗎？」然後用他火熱的嘴唇和舌頭親吻了陽茉梨……

altTitles.ja: 運命の巻戻士

description.en:
The world's most easy-to-understand and hot loop manga!

An organization that saves people who have tragically died, the Space-Time Police Special Task Force, also known as the "Rewind Officers"! Their weapon is the time machine "Retry Eye" embedded in their right eye! Rewind time dozens, hundreds, thousands of times until you solve the case! The first loop manga in CoroCoro's 45-year history, a must-see!

title.en: Kyou, Eki de Mita Kawaii Onna no Ko.

altTitles.en: Cute Girl I Saw at the Station Today.

altTitles.ja: 今日、駅で見た可愛い女の子。

description.en:
An observational comedy about an older man obsessed with beauty products and a seemingly perfect girl(?!).
Kameyama, a middle-aged man, can't help but notice what the pretty girl he sees at the train station is wearing. That Milbon scent is loved by all of mankind! This glittering case is from Sebon Star! That glowing skin... isn't a treatment, just a highlight! Which brand's cosmetics wear off, and which ones last? "I wanna know all about it!" he thinks to himself. Many of those "young lady things" he's become obsessed with now, appear before him!
description.ja: 可愛いもの博識おじさん×完ぺき女子(!?)、駅で一瞬すれ違うだけの観察型コメディ！ アラフォーの亀山は、駅で見かける可愛い子が身に着けているものが気になって仕方がない。この全人類が好きな香りはミルボン！キラキラしたあの箱はセボンスター！ 肌ツヤは……美容医療ではなくハイライト！ どこのブランドが崩れにくい？ あ～～教えてくれ～～～～！ あなたが夢中になった「乙女アイテム」がたくさん登場！

altTitles.ja: 義理チョコ嫌いの男女

altTitles.en: A Man and a Woman Who Hate Obligatory Chocolates

altTitles.ja: スライム聖女

description.en: The weakest monster (slime) who longed to be human is reincarnated as a saint, but with the worst character of all, a villainous noble girl. From the lowest status, hated and resented; an existence where she will be terminated immediately if her true identity as a slime is discovered, she will become a beloved saint in order to live a safe and secure life!

altTitles.en: Vanguard YouthQuake

description.en:
"I Think it's time for me to stop...playing Vanguard." "You've Got to Grow out of this Kid's Game."
Sentatsu Meguru, a first-year high school student, was wondering whether or not to continue playing Vanguard when his childhood friends and classmates are starting to quit.
One day, the master of his favorite café takes him to a fight with his grandfather,Kuranaga Sanzou.
Through the fight, Sanzou asks him a question, which leads him to look into his own mind, and is naturally led to the answer.
"I love it so much, there's no way I can stop!"
Then, he awoke to a strange power that allowed him to see the unit and the light that was connected to it on the board.
Quake your Soul!! A new story that Leads you to Vanguard!

I thought it was just platonic, spending the rest of our lives together as nothing more than friends… That was until Han Jei broke the news: “Seojin, I’m getting married.” 

Seojin, who was adopted to Germany when he was a child, has maintained a 15 year long relationship with Jei. When confronted with the prospect of Jei’s marriage, he realizes he’s in love with him. Working as a pilot, Seojin moves back to Korea in an attempt to run away, but his plan starts to unravel when Jei boards the flight to follow him. The two find themselves living together in Korea as Jei’s wedding date rapidly approaches. 

“Seojin, you’re not acting like this because of me, are you?”

As Seojin tries to push Jei away due to his emerging desires and Jei wishes to rekindle their precious friendship, they spend more time with each other and the tension between them begins to arise…
description.fr: "Je pensais que c'était juste platonique, passer le reste de notre vie ensemble comme de simples amis..." C'était jusqu'à ce que Han Jei annonce la nouvelle : "Seo Jin, je vais me marier." Seo Jin, qui a été adopté en Allemagne lorsqu'il était enfant, entretient une relation de 15 ans avec Jei. Lorsqu'il est confronté à la perspective du mariage de Jei, il se rend compte qu'il est amoureux de lui. Travaillant comme pilote, Seo Jin retourne en Corée pour tenter de s'enfuir, mais son plan commence à s'effondrer lorsque Jei monte à bord du vol pour le suivre. Les deux se retrouvent à vivre ensemble en Corée alors que la date du mariage de Jei approche à grands pas. "Seo Jin, tu n'agis pas comme ça à cause de moi, n'est-ce pas ?" Alors que Seo Jin essaie de repousser Jei en raison de ses désirs émergents et que Jei souhaite raviver leur précieuse amitié, ils passent plus de temps ensemble et la tension entre eux commence à surgir...
description.ko: 우정이라고 생각했다. 가장 가까운 곳에서 평생을 함께할, ...그냥 친구. "서진아, 나 결혼해." 한재이가 청천벽력 같은 소식을 전하기 전까지는. 어린 시절 독일로 입양되어 재이와 15년간 우정을 지켜온 서진. 그의 결혼이라는 현실과 맞닥뜨리고서야 재이에 대한 감정이 사랑이었음을 깨닫게 된다. 항공사 기장으로 근무하던 서진은 도망치듯 한국으로 이직하지만 재이가 서진을 따라 한국행 비행기에 오르며 계획은 점점 더 어긋나게 된다. 재이의 결혼을 앞둔 채 한국에서 아슬한 동거를 시작하게 된 두 사람. "서진아, 혹시 나 때문에 그러는 건 아니지?" 자꾸만 피어나는 욕심에 그를 밀어내려는 서진과 소중한 친구를 되찾고 싶은 재이, 함께하는 시간이 길어질수록 두 사람 사이에는 미묘한 분위기가 흐르는데…
